segments.text: can I see these silk ties ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Anything else ? The tie pins ? The cuff links ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . I want to have a look at that scarf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . We have several kinds of scarves here . Let me get them for you . Just wait a minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I like this one . I have been looking for this color and design . Please wrap it for me , and I ’ ll take it .
segments.speaker: S1
